paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the sequencing of a South Asian Indian female genome and identifies several genetic variants, including one in the BRCA2 gene associated with breast cancer risk.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: We also found an exon 10 BRCA2 variant (N372H; OMIM_ID # 600185.0133) associated with increased risk for breast cancer.

functional_data.summary: The N372H variant in BRCA2 is associated with increased breast cancer risk.

variants.additional_notes: The variant is noted in the context of breast cancer susceptibility.
key_quotes: We also found an exon 10 BRCA2 variant (N372H; OMIM_ID # 600185.0133) associated with increased risk for breast cancer.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the paper provided clear information regarding the BRCA2 variant.
